name: Platus
headline: Instant Legal Infrastructure - Draft, Sign, Notarize & Process
description: Platus delivers fast, reliable legal infrastructure with a no-code platform and API, designed to support SMBs with instant access to notarization, legal drafting, e-signing, and workflow automations. Our solution removes the high costs and slow processing of traditional legal services, by empowering businesses to seamlessly manage compliance and legal tasks.

founders.name: Alexander Sporenberg, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder @Platus; First ones to solve Online Notarizations in Europe

Previously: Founding team & Head of Acquisition at European unicorn that scaled to €1bn+ valuation, 500+ employees, and 150 acquisitions. Overseeing 100+ M&A deals

founders.name: Felix Gerlach, Founder/Building
founders.description:
Co-Founder of Platus.com;
Co-founded and exited Passbase Inc. (KYC / AML B2B SaaS) in 2023

### Built for serious work.
Personalized Legal Agents
From automating contracts to filling documents on scale. Legal agents can help your team to execute legal work faster.

## Reduce Legal Operations by 2x with Smarter Workflows
Platus makes legal workflows astonishingly simple, offering everything from a powerful no-code experience to a robust API
Platus simplifies legal workflows, enabling tasks like auto-filling agreements for 50+ angel investors in an investment round using pre-stored data.
Platus empowers businesses to trigger NDAs and contracts directly, automating templates with variable detection while enabling a final sanity check by legal teams.
Platus enables high-volume notarizations by automating the signing, and notarization of documents, ideal for businesses handling thousands of POAs.
Which task can platus AI automate for you.
Book Demo
![⌘](https://www.platus.com/icons/command.svg)
k

Improved legal operations by as much as 30%

Robin Rudolph, COO

## Real Use Cases with realimpact on your efficiency.
### Real Estate
  * Notarization API
  * Signing Feature
  * KYC Process
  * Data Collection


### Law Firm
  * Document Filling Agents
  * Signing Feature
  * Smart Document CRM
  * Compliance Workflows


### Compliance
  * Collecting Signatures
  * Notariation API
  * KYC Process
  * Document Extraction


### Legal Teams
  * Document Generation Agent
  * Smart People CRM
  * Collecting Signatures
  * Compliance Workflow


## No Code or API. You Decide.
We provide a powerful API to facilitate notarizations on scale. For non-technical teams, we provide a stand alone links.

Talk to us. Let Platus automate Your Legal Operations.

generated_description:
### Overview of Platus

**Company Name:** Platus  
**Founded:** 2024  
**Incorporated:** Part of Y Combinator Batch F24  
**Location:** Remote (Munich and San Francisco based)  
**Website:** [platus.com](https://www.platus.com)

#### Mission
Platus aims to provide **Instant Legal Infrastructure**—a streamlined way for businesses to draft, sign, notarize, and process legal documents. The overarching goal is to democratize access to legal services, enabling small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) to manage legal tasks easily and affordably.

#### What They Do
Initially crafted as a no-code platform, Platus offers a powerful API designed to tackle the high costs and slow processing times associated with traditional legal services. Their services include:
- **Legal Drafting:** Quickly produce legal documents with automation.
- **E-Signing:** Seamless signing processes for contracts and agreements.
- **Notarization:** Instant access to notarization services.
- **Workflow Automation:** Simplifies the flow of legal tasks to improve efficiency.

The mission is clear: to strip away the complexity of legal operations so that businesses can focus on their core missions.

#### Target Audience
Platus is focused primarily on law firms, fast-growing startups, and mid-sized enterprises that require efficient legal operations without the heavy overhead costs.

#### Current Activities
Platus is actively implementing several features to broaden its impact:
- **Document Drafting and AI Fill:** Automates the creation of various legal documents.
- **Approval Management:** Integrates human oversight in automated processes, ensuring compliance without sacrificing speed.
- **Smart Legal Agents:** Uses AI to enhance legal workflow efficiency, making it easier for teams to execute tasks effectively.

#### Achievements
The company has made significant strides in a short period, with results highlighting:
- Contracts sent and closed five times faster.
- Average time-saving of 22 hours in contract execution processes.
- Helped replace around 1.2 personnel on average per organizational unit due to process automation.

### Why It Matters
In the convoluted world of legal compliance and documentation, Platus stands out by making legal operations not just manageable but also scalable. With their no-code solution and API, they give power back to businesses, transforming how legal processes are approached.

#### Closing Thought
Platus is leveraging technology to simplify and modernize legal tasks, showing what happens when you combine ingenuity with necessity. They are effectively taking the cumbersome world of legal services and turning it into a playground where efficiency and compliance thrive together. 

For businesses looking to optimize their legal workflows—whether you're drafting contracts or managing compliance—Platus could be the ally you didn't know you needed. 

Explore more at [Platus](https://www.platus.com).
